CustomField.description: This field is getting used in visualforce page "icPaymentInvoicePDF" to get the company name based on location.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISBLANK( Applicant__c ), TEXT(Contractor__r.BillingCountryCode) ='CA', TEXT(Contractor__r.Loyalty_Program_Type__c) = 'CRC' ), 'CanRoof Corporation', IF( AND( ISBLANK( Applicant__c ), TEXT(Contractor__r.BillingCountryCode) = 'CA', TEXT(Contractor__r.Loyalty_Program_Type__c) <>'CRC' ), 'IKO Industries Ltd.', IF( AND( Applicant__r.Country_Code_Applicant__c = 'CA', TEXT(Contractor__r.Loyalty_Program_Type__c) = 'CRC' ), 'CanRoof Corporation', IF( AND( Applicant__r.Country_Code_Applicant__c = 'CA', TEXT(Contractor__r.Loyalty_Program_Type__c) <> 'CRC' ), 'IKO Industries Ltd.', 'IKO Industries Inc.'))))
CustomField.label: IKO Office
